reviewText:
My husband and I sat down to watch this, and could only handle a few minutes.  I have heard of this concept before, and would rather re-read AA1026 again, rather than watch this entire dvd.
I was expecting a documentary, and all that I saw was a man, not unlike a televangelist yelling about the government, etc.
I don't like people yelling to get me to listen.  He looked like he was from 1970's, and crazy.
I wouldn't want this person to be a representative of my beloved church, as he has a strange "feel" to his personality.
